Meta.Title: 0xF
Meta.Description: A lightweight, open-source collection of practical development tools.

Hero.Title: Utilities, Right at Hand
Hero.Description: A lightweight, open-source collection of practical development tools.

Features.Title: Built for Developers Who Care
Features.Description: Simple and reliable utilities for everyday development work, always ready when you need them.

Items.Title: Free and Unlimited
Items.Description: All tools are available with no limits.

Items.Title: Open Source
Items.Description: Open source on GitHub. Review the code, contribute, or self-host.

Items.Title: Privacy-Friendly
Items.Description: All tools run directly in your browser, with no backend processing involved.

Items.Title: Predictable Results
Items.Description: Results are based on defined rules, rather than generative AI language models.

Items.Title: Practical by Design
Items.Description: Focused utilities for common development tasks, designed to be easy to use.

Items.Title: Multiple Languages
Items.Description: Supports multiple languages for developers around the world.

Ready.Title: Ready when you need it
Ready.Description: Everything works as expected, right in your browser.
